survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the networking experience at professional conferences to improve future events.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?

questions.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question to capture diverse participation.

script.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking opportunities?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking opportunities?

questions.question_text: Did you make any valuable professional connections at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure connection success.

script.question_text: Did you make any valuable professional connections at the conference?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend this conference again based on the networking experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend this conference again based on the networking experience?
